insert into traingoods (tgoodsint, tgoodsname, tgoodsturn, tgoodscontents, tgoodsprice, tgoodsnum, membernum, gymnum) values (null, #{tgoodsname}, 1, #{tgoodscontents}, #{tgoodsprice}, #{tgoodsnum}, #{membernum}, #{gymnum})
mapper.update: UPDATE traingoods SET tgoodsturn = CASE WHEN tgoodsturn = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE tgoodsint = #{tgoodsint};
mapper.delete: delete from traingoods where tgoodsint in (#{tgoodsint});
mapper.select: SELECT mpay.*, member.mname FROM traingoods INNER JOIN mpay ON traingoods.tgoodsint = mpay.tgoodsint INNER JOIN member ON mpay.membernum = member.membernum WHERE traingoods.membernum = #{membernum};
